title: Scheduled maintenance
message: We will be performing updates to iNZight Lite from December 20 to December 22, 2023. During this time, iNZight Lite may be unavailable or unstable. Please get in touch if you need to use iNZight Lite during this time.

title: New Release 2023.06
message: Last month we released the June update for iNZight Lite. This update includes a number of new features and bug fixes. For more information, see the change log.

title: Ongoing server issues
message: We are aware of a server issue causing some users to be disconnected. Please try hard-refreshing the page every 5 minutes. Let us know if you're consistently unable to connect. Thank you for your patience.

title: Back-up for VUW students
message: If you are having trouble accessing Lite for your test, we have a back-up version available at lite-vuw.up.railway.app. Please note that this version has lower resources and may be slower than usual, so please only use this if the main version is not working for you
